casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. Goney, Appellant.

[Cite as State v. Goney (1995), 72 Ohio St.3d 314.]

(No. 94-2590 Submitted March 21, 1995 Decided June 14, 1995.) *315Mathias H. Heck, Jr., Montgomery County Prosecuting Attorney, and Carley J. Ingram, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee. Thomas B. Goney, pro se. Per Curiam.

We affirm the judgment of the court of appeals for the reasons stated in its opinion.

Judgment affirmed

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Wright, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer and Cook, JJ., concur.
